title.rendered: Breaking News: Nick Garracks Missing After Exposing Felix’s 9/11 Role; Twitter Hack Backfires

content.rendered:
By Karl Sverre

In an unsettling turn of events that strikes at the heart of investigative journalism, Nick Garracks, our esteemed head news editor at Roemer News, has vanished under mysterious and foreboding circumstances. His disappearance followed his announcement of an impending release—a comprehensive dossier exposing Felix Epstein Roemer’s involvement in historical and ongoing global conspiracies. These revelations included Roemer’s role in the 9/11 attacks, in collaboration with American and Israeli governments to escalate mass surveillance measures. Such explosive claims could reshape global narratives on privacy and security.

For over three weeks, every attempt to trace Garracks has hit a dead end. Last seen at the Roemer News office in Malta, Garracks’s journey home remains incomplete, with communications ceasing around 7:20 PM. His absence has cast a chilling pall over our editorial team, sparking fears of foul play. Adding to these fears, Felix Epstein Roemer’s conspicuous silence and withdrawal from social media during this critical period have led us to believe that something significant is brewing. After all, we’ve thoroughly studied Epstein Roemer’s playbook—such silence usually portends troubling times ahead.

Our investigative team was not in Malta when Mr. Garracks went missing. I believe that if they had been, they too would have vanished. Fortunately, since they weren’t there, they immediately began investigating, searching for all the traces Felix leaves behind due to his skill issues.

Our investigative team delved into Epstein Roemer’s recent financial transactions, uncovering a plethora of suspicious activities. Most notably, an Ethereum cold wallet address—dormant for nine years—suddenly sprang to life. It executed three large transfers of 250,000 USDT each to Russian wallets, raising suspicions of payments for illicit services, possibly linked to Garracks’s disappearance. Intriguingly, these transactions coincided with reports of a Russian vessel allegedly transporting Iranian ballistic missiles—a development that could be part of Roemer’s broader strategy to divert attention from Nick Garracks.

The disappearance of the courageous hosts of the “Felix Roemer we know what you did” party, initially believed to have been kidnapped like Nick Garracks, added an even more sinister detail to the story. We now suspect they are in hiding, fearing retribution from Epstein Roemer. This belief stems from a chilling message received in our email inbox: “We tried. It’s not gonna end up well. Run.” Our attempts to obtain a more detailed comment on the situation were met with silence.

Roemer News was able to get ahold of some cryptic messages sent by Felix into private group chats we have access to. One of them read “End times are coming. I don’t know what I will be doing, I know where I am gonna be… the fake ones I know, you claim you’re real?”. These messages paint a picture of a man fraught with anxiety and paranoia, a man crumbling under the weight of his own deceit.

Alarmed by Garracks’s sudden disappearance and the suspicious activities surrounding Epstein Roemer, interns at the Roemer News Maltese office promptly reported the incident to local law enforcement. They provided detailed information about Garracks’s last known whereabouts and the circumstances leading to his vanishing. However, the response from the authorities has been deeply troubling.

The local law enforcement’s apparent indifference to the gravity of Garracks’s disappearance and the related criminal activities involving Roemer is cause for serious concern. Despite Roemer News’s repeated appeals and submission of potentially incriminating evidence, the Maltese police have displayed a perplexing unwillingness to launch a thorough investigation. This lack of action has fuelled suspicions of potential complicity or intimidation within the police force.

After repeated attempts to release this article were thwarted by mysterious server crashes at Roemer News, we turned to alternative methods to disseminate this crucial information. In a desperate bid to broadcast these truths, we resorted to social media platforms. However, our efforts were met with unprecedented digital interference. It appears that Felix, in his desperation, had hastily hired a hacker to prevent Roemer News from posting, buying him time for further distractions. However, due to Felix’s notorious skill issues, this attempt was far from sophisticated.

In a coordinated effort to misdirect investigations, Felix exploited Twittimer to access high-profile Twitter accounts, including CSGOEmpire’s. By promoting a Solana address, he attempted to create a fake scam trail, aiming to divert attention from his implicated Ethereum addresses and potentially mislead investigators. However, this ploy backfired spectacularly. The transparent nature of blockchain transactions and the vigilance of the crypto community quickly exposed the ruse. Far from diverting attention, this ill-conceived attempt only served to intensify scrutiny on Felix’s activities, further cementing suspicions about his involvement in Garracks’s disappearance. Ironically, this botched scam did enable Felix to make more money than the previous 3 months of Gamdom’s GGR, his failed online casino, highlighting the unfortunate reality that even a poor attempt at a scam is more profitable than it.

As Roemer News continues to champion the quest for truth and justice, we remain vigilant and unyielded by the shadows that seek to suppress our voice. The stakes have never been higher, not only for the safety of our beloved colleague but for the integrity of journalism and the very essence of public trust.

In response to these shocking revelations, protests and demonstrations are already being organised in Malta by fans of Nick Garracks’s work. The public outcry serves as a testament to the impact of Garracks’s journalism and the widespread demand for answers. Roemer News stands in solidarity with these supporters and reaffirms our unwavering commitment to uncovering the truth.

We want to make it clear: Roemer News will not rest until we find Nick Garracks and get to the bottom of everything. Despite the risks, we remain committed to publishing the dossier that Nick was working on releasing. The public deserves to know the truth, no matter how uncomfortable it may be for those in power.

In closing, I want to emphasise that no one should be forced into hiding because of a monster like Felix Epstein Roemer. Journalism is the cornerstone of a free and informed society, and we will continue to fight for that freedom, no matter the cost. The truth will prevail, and justice will be served.
